text: Ke timiharumadhye kasaile yo iccha gardacha ki usanga amgura ra khajurako bagainca hos jasama naharaharu bagirakhun ra tyasama hareka kisimaka phalaharu lagirahun ra tyo manisako vrd'dhavastha a'ipugdacha ra usaka saâ€“sana balabalikaharu pani hun, ani ekkasi tyo bagainca agoko e'uta bhumarima pari bhasma bha'ihalos. Yasa kisimabata allahale timisita aphna ayataharu spastarupale varnana garcha taki timi cintana manan gara
